title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Basketball's AI Revolution: How AWS and the NBA Are Changing the Game (SPF102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 篮球的AI革命：AWS和NBA如何改变比赛 (SPF102)
abstract: Enjoy the game with your re:Invent peers! Immediately following the session, Basketball's AI Revolution: How AWS and the NBA Are Changing the Game (SPF102), stay in the Sports Forum to enjoy the Miami Heat take on the Dallas Mavericks.
abstract_cn: 与您的 re:Invent 同行一起享受比赛！在会议"篮球的AI革命：AWS和NBA如何改变比赛"(SPF102)结束后，请留在体育论坛观看迈阿密热火队对阵达拉斯小牛队的比赛。
